sentences: Tämä tuore leipä on erittäin pehmeää.
context: The Finnish word 'tuore' is an adjective meaning 'fresh', 'new', or 'recent'. It describes something that is new, recently made, produced, or occurred. For food items like bread, fruit, fish, etc., it means fresh and not stale. When used for experiences or time periods, it can mean recent or new. The word follows Finnish adjective inflection patterns, changing form based on the case of the noun it modifies.
